question: Which HTTP method is used to retrieve data from a server?
What HTTP method is used to submit data to be processed to a specified resource?
Which HTTP method is used to update a resource?
What HTTP method is used to delete a specified resource?
Which HTTP method is used to apply partial modifications to a resource?
What HTTP method is used to retrieve the headers of a resource without fetching its body?
Which HTTP method is used to describe the communication options for the target resource?
What HTTP method is used to establish a network connection to a resource?
Which HTTP method is used to perform a message loop-back test along the path to the target resource?
What HTTP method is considered idempotent, meaning multiple identical requests should have the same effect as a single request?
